sentences.sentence: All these actions, singly and in combination, are part of the tested and true armamentarium of science.
sentences.translation: 全部的这些行动，单独的或是联合的，就是科学研究的检验和真正的设备的一部分。

sentences.sentence: Moreover, more investment in the media armamentarium and technology are needed, as well as training a host of professionals in media.
sentences.translation: 不仅如此，还要加大对传播的物质和技术投入，并培养一批既熟悉中国又了解世界，既懂对外传播又懂外语的专业传播人才。

sentences.sentence: Fortunately, therapeutic paradigms are shifting, and clinicians have many new agents in their armamentarium for combating fungal infection.
sentences.translation: 幸运的是，抗真菌感染的治疗策略正发生转变，临床医师有多种新药可用于对抗真菌感染。
